sentences.en: Bandy sesame seed: Yes Renqiu unique traditional flavor snacks, exquisite craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 罗圈烧饼: 是任丘独有的传统风味小吃, 制作工艺考究.

sentences.en: Chinese kites have unique national styles in craftsmanship , modelling, designs, and colours.
sentences.cn: 中国风筝在工艺, 制作, 设计和色彩上具有独特民族风格.

sentences.en: Editors liked that kind of thoughtful craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 编辑们喜欢这种设想周到的工艺.

sentences.en: His canoes are known for their style, fine detail and craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 他的独木舟以其风格独特、注重细节和做工精细著称。

sentences.en: I think my friends will marvel at the craftsmanship as well.
sentences.cn: 我想我的朋友也会为其工艺而惊叹.

sentences.en: It is easy to appreciate the craftsmanship of Armani.
sentences.cn: 阿玛尼的精致工艺很容易博得人们的赞誉。

sentences.en: Painstaking craftsmanship using natural materials is key to Southwestern style.
sentences.cn: 对天然材料的精心制作工艺是西南部厨房风格的关键所在.

sentences.en: The kitchen is simplicity itself, relying on a combination of good design, craftsmanship and quality materials for its effect.
sentences.cn: 厨房非常简洁，这有赖于好的设计、工艺及可体现这种效果的上乘材料。

sentences.en: The pattern is so nice and the craftsmanship is superb!
sentences.cn: 款式很好看,手工也很好!

sentences.en: The whole house is a monument to her craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 那整座房子是她技艺的一座丰碑。

sentences.en: The work is perfect in craftsmanship.
This includes sculptures as well as works of artistic craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 这包括雕塑以及艺术技能的作品.

sentences.en: We admired the delicacy of the craftsmanship.
sentences.cn: 我们佩服工艺师精巧的手艺.

sentences.en: We admired the superb craftsmanship of the furniture.
sentences.cn: 我们很欣赏这个家具的一流工艺.

sentences.en: Wonderful. I think my friends will marvel at the craftsmanship as well.
sentences.cn: 太棒了. 我想我的朋友还会为其工艺而惊叹的.

trans.tran_en: the special skill that someone uses to make something beautiful with their hands
